origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_market_trends', 'description': 'This function provides market trends for a specified sector within a given time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector for which market trends are requested, e.g., internet_finance, technology, healthcare.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for which market trends are requested, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trends', 'description': 'A summary of market trends for the specified sector and time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_market_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'internet_finance', 'timeFrame'是'last_year'.
